hive_lesson.title: 1108 Boys Camp
hive_lesson.description: Warren talks about his summer camp memories.

hive_text_custom.text: : So we're talking about camp today. Did you ever go to camp when you were a kid?
: I did. I usually went to Cub camp, you know like Boy Scouts.
: OK. Was it during the summer?
: Yes, it would always be in the summer.
: And was it for a week or a month?
: I can't recall, it probably was about a week.
: About a week. What did you do at Cub camp?
: We'd do different things. One thing I remember is archery.
: Yeah, like bows and arrows. So we would have a target and we would practice trying to hit the

and I was really bad at it. I remember always, it's quite difficult and I would hurt my arm with the bow. But then after we were trying to get the target I remember we did distance as well and I was actually pretty good at that. I figured out how to get a long shot away and I think, I might be lying, but I think I maybe got the longest shot than anyone else.
: Wow. Congratulations. OK, besides archery were there other games you played or sports you did?
: Yeah, we would learn how to canoe and we'd swim and we'd go on hikes. We learned how to
through the forest with a compass.
: OK. Did you learn how to start fire without matches?
: We did, yeah. We'd use two sticks, rub them together and start a fire.
: Wow. What would you guys do at night? Would you play games or have campfires?
: Yes, we'd always have a campfire at night. We'd sing some songs, Kumbaya, and
some skits and tell ghost stories but my favorite thing to do at the campfire was roast marshmallows.
: I'd spend hours trying to find the perfect stick to carve and roast marshmallows on. Sometimes we'd even make the chocolate smores for the marshmallows.
: Yummy. So that food was good, how was the other food?

: I don't have any memories of it being good so I don't think it was very good. We would eat together in a mess hall much like yourself and actually I remember getting really sick one time and my parents had to come and pick me up and I think I got a bit of
: In scout camp, wow. OK. Final question, so you were away from your family right?
: It was easy. I remember feeling a little freer and more independent away from my parents, less rules, less
: No, I never did get homesick. Even when my parents came to pick me up that time when I was sick, I really didn't want to go home.
: It's too bad you got food poisoning.

answers: a) He did it at Cub camp.
d) He tried to hit a target.

2) What was Warren good at in archery?
3) What else did Warren do at camp?
4) What did they do at night at camp?

answers: b) There were lots of rules.
c) He got sick one time.
d) He has no memories of camp.
hive_lesson_quiz.question: 5) How does Warren describe his camp experience?
